column4: hey all... i have a question.... i'm trying to et freenet working, but it's having some java issues... i've tried installing java "manually," but i guess i didn't do something right... i've tried doing it through synaptic package manager, but i can't find it (even though i've added all of the repositories that it comes with and have clicked "reload")... any ideas as to why java isn't showing up on the list?
check /etc/apt/sources.list is there anythign comented out?
if that doesnt work, have you checked out this page? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Java?highlight=%28java%29
